definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="baseRate">baseRate</variable><variable type="Number" id="rateWithAmplifier">rateWithAmplifier</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:baseRate</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is how many ticks it takes to activate the effect when the level is 1</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">60</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Lower values will make the effect faster.</comment></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:rateWithAmplifier</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is how many ticks it takes to activate the effect at any level</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">DIVIDE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Each level makes the effect twice as fast</comment><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:baseRate</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">POWER</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">amplifier</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This check is to avoid divisions by 0</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_singular_ops"><field name="OP">ROUNDDOWN</field><value name="NUM"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:rateWithAmplifier</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="return_logic"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is true every "rateWithAmplifier" ticks</comment><value name="return"><block type="math_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MOD</field><value name="A"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">duration</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_singular_ops"><field name="OP">ROUNDDOWN</field><value name="NUM"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:rateWithAmplifier</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="return_logic"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">If the rate is 0 or negative, the effect is activated every tick</comment><value name="return"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
